name: Tooling & The Webapp Development Stack
author: Paul Irish
description: Let's dive into the latest improvements to developer tools that support your productivity in authoring JavaScript experiences.

tools.title: HTML5 ★ BOILERPLATE
tools.description: The web’s most popular front-end template

tools.title: Blueprint
tools.description: Blueprint is a CSS framework, which aims to cut down on your development time

tools.title: Email-Boilerplate
tools.description: The email boilerplate for sending out nicely formatted messages

tools.title: Dojo Boilerplate
tools.description: A starting point for developing with Dojo

tools.title: jQuery Boilerplate
tools.description: Jump-starting jQuery plugins development

tools.title: SASS
tools.description: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

tools.title: Compass
tools.description: Compass is an open-source CSS Authoring Framework

tools.title: Compass
tools.description: Compass is an open-source CSS Authoring Framework

tools.title: Less
tools.description: Less is a CSS pre-processor

tools.title: closure-stylesheets
tools.description: Closure Stylesheets is an extension to CSS that adds variables, functions, conditionals, and mixins to standard CSS

tools.title: Stylus
tools.description: Expressive, dynamic, robust CSS

tools.title: Haml
tools.description: Beautiful, DRY,well-indented, clear markup

tools.title: Daring fireball markdown
tools.description: Markdown is a text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers

tools.title: Jade
tools.description: Node templating engine

tools.title: Handlebars
tools.description: Handlebars provides the power necessary to let you build semantic templates effectively with no frustration

tools.title: Zencoding
tools.description: Set of plugins for HTML and CSS hi-speed coding

tools.title: Dart
tools.description: https://www.dartlang.org/

tools.title: CoffeeScript
tools.description: CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript

tools.title: Livereload
tools.description: CSS edits and image changes apply live

tools.title: Codekit
tools.description: It's like steroids for web developers

tools.title: Aptana
tools.description: The world’s most powerful open-source web development IDE just got better

tools.title: Webstorm
tools.description: The smartest JavaScript IDE

tools.title: JS Hint
tools.description: a tool that helps to detect errors and potential problems in your JavaScript code

tools.title: Closure Linter
tools.description: A utility that checks JavaScript files for style issues such as operator placement, missing semicolons, spacing, the presence of JsDoc annotations, and more

tools.title: Browser Stack
tools.description: Live, Web-Based Browser Testing

tools.title: QUnit
tools.description: A JavaScript Unit Testing framework

tools.title: Jasmine
tools.description: Behavior-Driven JavaScript

tools.title: Testling
tools.description: Run your broswer test on every push

tools.title: Selenium
tools.description: Browser Automation

tools.title: Watir WebDriver
tools.description: the most elegant way to use webdriver with ruby

tools.title: Closure Compiler
tools.description: The Closure Compiler is a tool for making JavaScript download and run faster

tools.title: YUI Compressor
tools.description: Yahoo compressor

tools.title: HTML Compressor
tools.description: HTML Compressor and Minifier

tools.title: Scour
tools.description: Scour is an open-source Python script that aggressively cleans SVG files, removing a lot of 'cruft' that certain tools or authors embed into their documents

tools.title: Image Optim
tools.description: ImageOptim is a free app that makes images take up less disk space and load faster, without sacrificing quality

tools.title: OptiPNG
tools.description: Advanced PNG Optimizer

tools.title: Trimage
tools.description: A cross-platform tool for losslessly optimizing PNG and JPG files

tools.title: PNG Quant
tools.description: pngquant is a command-line utility and a library for lossy compression of PNG images

tools.title: imgmin
tools.description: Lossy image optimization

tools.title: Grunt
tools.description: The JavaScript Task Runner
